name: df-lmi
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(clmi, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, crn(cfv(clng, cv(s0))), cmpt(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), crio(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(co(cv(s2), cfv(cmid, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cv(s1)), wo(wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cperpg, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), cfv(clng, cv(s0)), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ lInvG =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà ran((LineG ` s0))‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(Base ` s0)‚Ü¶ iota(s3 ‚àà(Base ` s0),((s2[(midG ` s0)]s3)‚àà s1 ‚àß(s1[(perpG ` s0)](s2[(LineG ` s0)]s3)‚à® s2 = s3))))))
comment: Define the line mirroring function. Definition 10.3 of [Schwabhauser] p. 89. See ~ islmib . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2019.)
